## 재학생 점수 히스토그램

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
# if(sum(FA) > 0) {
#     total <- total[!FA, ]
#  }

#> 점수분포표
total$Total %>%  
  cut(breaks = seq(0, 100, by = 10), 
      include.lowest = TRUE, 
      right = FALSE) %>%
  table %>%
  as.matrix %>%
  t %>%
  pander
h <- 
  total$Total %>% 
  hist(breaks = seq(0, 100, by = 5), 
       include.lowest = TRUE,
       right = FALSE,
       yaxt = "n",
       prob = FALSE, 
       col = "white",
       main = "Histogram")
axis(side = 1, at = seq(0, 100,  by = 10), labels = seq(0, 100, by = 10))
axis(side = 2, at = h$counts, labels = h$counts, las = 2)
```

## 재학생 점수 분포표

```{r, echo = FALSE}
Counts_tbl <- total$Total %>% 
  cut(breaks = c(0, 20, 40, 60, 70, 80, 85, 90, 95, 100),
      labels = c("[0 ~ 20)", 
                 "[20 ~ 40)",
                 "[40 ~ 60)",
                 "[60 ~ 70)", 
                 "[70 ~ 80)", 
                 "[80 ~ 85)", 
                 "[85 ~ 90)",
                 "[90 ~ 95)", 
                 "[95 ~ 100]"), 
      include.lowest = TRUE, 
      right = FALSE) %>%
  table %>%
  rev %>% 
  t %>% 
  `row.names<-`("Counts") %>%
# row.names(scores_tbl) <- "Counts"
# scores_tbl %>%
  cbind("계" = rowSums(.)) %>%
  t
Prop_tbl <- total$Total %>% 
  cut(breaks = c(0, 20, 40, 60, 70, 80, 85, 90, 95, 100),
      labels = c("[0 ~ 20)", 
                 "[20 ~ 40)",
                 "[40 ~ 60)",
                 "[60 ~ 70)", 
                 "[70 ~ 80)", 
                 "[80 ~ 85)", 
                 "[85 ~ 90)",
                 "[90 ~ 95)", 
                 "[95 ~ 100]"), 
      include.lowest = TRUE, 
      right = FALSE) %>%
  table %>%
  prop.table %>%
  `*`(100) %>%
  round(digits = 2) %>%
  rev %>% 
  t %>% 
  `row.names<-`("Percentages") %>%
# row.names(scores_tbl) <- "Counts"
# scores_tbl %>%
  cbind("계" = rowSums(.)) %>%
  t 
Grades <- c("A+", "A0", "B+", "B0", "C+", "C0", "D+", "D0", "F", "")
# cbind(Counts_tbl, Prop_tbl, Grades) %>%
Cumulative_tbl <- cumsum(Prop_tbl)[-length(cumsum(Prop_tbl))]
cbind("Counts(명)" = Counts_tbl, 
      "Percentage(%)" = Prop_tbl, 
      "Cumulative Percentage(%)" = c(Cumulative_tbl, "")) %>%
  pander()
```

## 성적 등급 

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
# str(total)
total$Grades <- total$Total %>% 
  cut(breaks = c(0, 50, 100), 
      include.lowest = TRUE, 
      right = FALSE) %>%
  factor(levels = c("[50,100]", 
                    "[0,50)"),
         labels = c("Pass", "Non-Pass"))
counts <- total$Grades %>%
  table %>% 
  c("계" = sum(.))
perc <- total$Grades %>%
  table %>% 
  prop.table %>%
  c("계" = sum(.)) %>%
  `*`(100) %>%
  round(digits = 2) 
#> 대체 수강자 중 A+ => A0
counts2 <- total$Grades %>%
  table %>% 
  c("계" = sum(.))
perc2 <- total$Grades %>%
  table %>%
  prop.table %>%
  c("계" = sum(.)) %>%
  `*`(100) %>%
  round(digits = 2) 
# rbind("Counts" = counts2, 
#       "Percentage" = perc2, 
#       "Cumulative" = cumsum(perc2)) %>%
#   cbind("Sum" = rowSums(.)) %>%
#  format(digits = 1, nsmall = 1) %>%
rbind("Counts" = format(counts2, digits = 1, nsmall = 0), 
      "Percentage(%)" = format(perc2, digits = 1, nsmall = 1), 
      "Cumulative(%)" = format(cumsum(perc2), digits = 1, nsmall = 1)) %>%
# cbind("Sum" = rowSums(.)) %>%
#   format(digits = 1, nsmall = 1) %>%
  `[<-`(3, 3, "") %>%
  kable(align = "r")
```

```{r, individual scores, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
v_names_kr <- c("학번", "이름", "온라인출석", "구글설문지" , "온라인퀴즈", "TED 퀴즈", "데이터실험", "총점", "등급")

  kable(total_kr[total$ID %in% id, -1], 
        row.names = FALSE)
}
my_grade(c("20233530"))
# my_grade(c("이상민"))
```

```{r, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
total_kr$등급 %<>% 
  as.character
my_grade_print <-
  function(id){
    paste0(
      paste(names(total_kr[total$ID %in%  id, -1]),
          total_kr[total$ID %in% id, -1], 
          sep = " : "),
      c("", "/20", "/10", "/20", "/20", "/30", "/100", ""),
          collapse = "\t")
  }
my_grade_print("20246741") %>%
  data.frame(Grade_Report = .) %>%
  kable
#> x at the top remove
sapply(c("20233530", "20246741"), 
       FUN = my_grade_print) %>%
data.frame(Grade_Report = ., stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
kable(escape = TRUE, row.names = FALSE, col.names = NA)
#> List under 50
sapply(total[total$Total < 50, "ID"], 
       FUN = my_grade_print) %>%
  data.frame(Grade_Report = ., stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
  kable(escape = FALSE, row.names = FALSE)
```
